subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In Thursday’s Game 4 of the N.B.A. finals, the Heat’s offense was dispirited and disorganized, and their defense invariably left open a member of the Spurs.
snippet: In Thursday’s Game 4 of the N.B.A. finals, the Heat’s offense was dispirited and disorganized, and their defense invariably left open a member of the Spurs.
